address: 227 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10027, United States
name: Sottocasa

reviews.review: This has Amazing Food, the Neapolitan pizza was absolutely delicious! Awesome staff and Great flavors. Definitely a must try tbh
Pizza was delicious and fresh, staff was very helpful, will definitely come back
Authentic Napolitan pizza and great tiramisu

My third visit to Sottocasa Harlem, never disappoints. Im on a mission to try every pizza on the menu. My wife has Celiac (gluten sensitivity) which makes it difficult to find pizza options and this restaurant far exceeded our
Amazing Italian pizza, friendly service, and lambrusco! Don't miss the chili oil.
Good brick oven style pizza. Everyone is Italian making it a more authentic ambiance. All pizzas were delicious. Even the desserts were kicked clean. Little bit pricey but what isn't these days.
One of my favourite Italian restaurants in Harlem. Pizza is great and the tiramisu amazing. Service could definitely be nicer though (not very friendly).

This is a damn good Italian restaurant. Completely Italian, for real for real. As Italian as Maria with eyes full of melancholy, and a canary in the window. By which I mean this: it's authentic in the literal sense. This would be considered

The pizza is pretty good, but this place is so full of itself it it made me nauseous. Meanwhile the staff is very obviously segregated by gender and ethnicity, which is just creepy. Meanwhile, although the person bussing our table and
The pizza was fantastic!

About as lovely an Italian restaurant as you can get. True Italian hospitality, delicious pizza, excellent drink selection, delicious pizza, lovely interior, (and I cannot emphasize this enough) DELICIOUS PIZZA!!!
Delicious pizza and service. Will definitely be back and it was kid friendly. Loved the variety and the ability to meet everyones dietary needs. Lovely selection of libations too.
Best Pizza in town.  Impeccable service, great selection of wines, perfectly "executed" pizzas.  100% recommended

The menu variety has simple fresh ingredients, and the Italian beer was fantastic. Sottocasa is located in a brownstone ground floor with outdoor seating. The restaurant was quite busy, yet friendly and attentive service. It's near the 2 and 3 subway line in Central Harlem.
Located about a 2-3 min walk from the 125th street and Lenox Avenue subway station. Small and authentic Italian spot. VERY good customer service and delicious food.
Excellent!
Best service ever! Best price! Worth it and I honestly don't write reviews.My friend and I basically had a 3 course meal that was tasty, great service and
Delicious, amazing customer service. Will definitely return
Just the best place for pizza, tiramisu, coffee, prosecco etc. And the staff are super friendly. Love this place... Thank you!
Sagging pizza. Since when an Italian restaurant serves soup pizza?
One of the best brick oven pizzas in the city
My absolute favorite pizza shop in Harlem! The food is AMAZING and they have the best micro brewery beers!

Oh how I love New York. Their service, their food, their desert all excellent. I was so happy after ordering appetizer and pizzas, we ordered desert. They have so much personality here. Its a wonderful representation of Harlem.
Phenomenally delicious pizza!  Fantastic beer menu.
I ordered take out, and I have to say that the folded pizzas are absolutely fantastic!

I was just there getting gluten free pizza. The gf pizza was the best Ive had. I have celiac and I must have gluten free dough, which usually tastes, well, not worth eating. Sottocasa was so good, even my husband said he loved it. We will
Good vibes and good music inside this charming Pizzeria. Reminds me of of the pizza in Italy. I ordered the 4 Stagioni.
Pizza margherita and homemade tiramis
One of the best pizza in town!
Great pizza, intimate atmosphere, friendly service
Perfect Italian pizza and espresso! 4 Formaggi is my favorite;)
Best in nyc
AMAZING authentic italian pizza. And delicious wine
Really delicious Neapolitan pizza! Coming back for sure
Excellent service and the pizza and salad with whipped goat cheese was so, so GOOD !!!!!!
My favorite Pizza place outside of Italy - very delicious Italian style pizzas and home managed restaurant with real Italians atmosphere. Am in love with their Quattro formage pizzas. Must try

Their pizza is incredible. their Gluten free pizza (wife is intolerant) is the best in the city, but they simply cannot get the pizza out on time. We were given a 90 minute wait time, already insane for a pizza place...It took over two and half hours.
Awesome food ! Hospitality .
Best pizza in Harlem!
Fantastic family friendly outdoor dining, delicious gluten free focaccia and pizza, great Italian beer. Wonderful evening.
Incredible pizza - some of them very best Ive had in New York! Fresh, cooked to perfection, leopard print dough, highly recommend!

Waited all day to eat here for the first time with my daughter. We each had a personal pizza. Mine had artichoke n italian ham etc...I had 2 slices and some salad. A few hours later I became violently I'll..forced to throw up..pain all night ...3 days later..still can't eat but bread

Thee best pizza ever!! We drive from DC to Harlem for this exact place!! It's as authentically Italian as you will ever find. I can't wait until we as a nation fully recover from COVID-19, because if you have ever had the FULL dine in
Not big on pizza but this is a nice clean spot that I think everybody would enjoy
Good food but be prepared to wait. Doesn't matter if it's delivery, pickup, or dine-in, there will be a substantial wait.
Authentic Pizza...my favorites are the Margherita. Also the salads are amazing!!
Delicious food and phenomenal service.Very diligent about safety and protocols. Clean and warm outdoor seating. Ordered the focaccia, cab, Romana, rughetta and finished with the cannoli and coffee.
Amazon place. The pizza is delicious, the ambiance is amazing . And do not forget about the tiramisu
Authentic and genuine...pray for them to have La Birra di Meni!
I've only eaten here 1000 times so I'm sorry that I can't give it 10 stars. Oh yes. Oh YES! It's all about the NEOPOLITANO pizza! CANNOLI!!!!!!!!!
This is a great pizzeria and one of the few making real Neapolitan pizzas in the area. Very reasonably priced as well.
nice place
Amazing! Lovely service and food is immaculate

Delicious food and phenomenal service. Very diligent about safety and protocols. Clean and warm outdoor seating. Ordered the focaccia, cab, Romana, rughetta and finished with the cannoli and coffee. All excellent (especially the coffee and wine!) and fairly priced. Arrived hungry, left full and happy. Will be back!
this is the place for za in harlem
Pizza and the feeling here is quality. There was quick, helpful, and friendly service. Bring your hunger - portions are large. Ambience reminds me of Colorado Springs area.
yum
Italian owned restaurant. Pizza is very good and they have a gluten free option that tastes delicious. Very nice italian spot in the neighborhood! Definitely reccomended

A favorite location for tasty Pizza. you will not be disappointed in the menu and service. the service here is better than most. the prices are good for what you get. i can see why they have so many reviews.
Excellent homemade food. Delicious wine/champagne based cocktails and beers, and a great dessert menu
Very clean and safe!This is one of the best pizza in New York. real Italians doing Napoletana style pizza. I could not find any other place un upper Manhattan or Harlem that make

Great place to visit for pizza lovers like me! It's such a cozy place with staffs that are super friendly and attentive. I really love their pizza, its so crispy and so delicious! 5 star for the foods and 5 star for their great service! I will definitely visit here together with my friends or fam!
One of our favorites! Pizza and other goodies  are delicious. Very personal friendly service! The gluten free pizza is excellent too!!!

On a Friday night, our wait time for 3 pies was 2 hours. We live 2 blocks away from the restaurant. When it finally arrived after having to call to check in on our order twice, our pizza was cold and one pie wasn't even cut into slices. Unacceptable service for take-out, so beware.
This is some great pizza! The flavors were amazing and the online ordering platform was user friendly. Can't wait to try the other pizzas!
Ate here the first night of a vacation to NYC.  Next time I am in the city I will be back multiple times.  I have never had pizza this good before.
Food is always great and staff is very friendly.  One of my favorite brick oven pizzas.
Tried a small pizza with Sottocasa Pizzeria Harlem - delicious! I love the thin crust, and felt it had just the right amount of everything.
This place is adorable for a date or getting together with friends. Pizza and wine great combo. Their hazelnut sorbet is amazing!!
Pizza is authentic, the restaurant is clean and pretty, feels like being in a family kitchen, very cozy inside. Loved it
Don't see why it gets so much hype.  It was just mediocre pizza.  Sauce was whatever.
Stop for Takeout !!! Ordered 2 Pizza to go Pizza was not fully done watery cheese  Definitely Do Not Recommend!!!
We got the deep dish version of the Meateor pizza as well as the toasted kale appetizer. They were both amazingly good and the service was stellar. Great little spot. Wish we had it jn south Florida.
Fabulous salad, pizza and tiramisu. Great outdoor service. Unique find.
Perfect individual pizzas. This is a gem of a restaurant.
Good olive oil. Good crust. Solid flavor. More filling than you think.
pizza and the feeling here is excellent. prices that are reasonable. menu is like a cafe in boston i liked.
Incredible pizza. We ordered the Burrata special(F-S)
The pizza is amazing and their service is excellent, prices and fair and everything is delicious. Food taste just like if you were in Italy.  Superb.
Delicious pizza! Got the Verdure pizza for takeout and it was very good! The dough is authentic and made from scratch, and the sauce has a great flavor to it.

This restaurant was recommended in our guide partly because of its history. The food is average but the price is the highest we paid so far... totally not worth it as there are plenty of better places all around.However the staff was nice and they had baby chair, a plus for us.
Delicious
Best service ever
Pizza and the atmosphere here is excellent. the service here is great. this place has a good feel to it.
What can I say, mamma mia, just delicious. Authentic pizza like in Italy, very nice place and the staff very professional. A must come pizzeria.
I really like there $18 pizza gotta be in the mood for it tho I would trek to patys
Some of the best pizza in New York.
WE ORDERED 4  MARGARITA PIZZA FOR DELIVERY AND THEY WERE DELICIOUS...THANK ** SO MUCH...
Delicious
Excellent pizza. Tasted great and had fresh ingredients.
Great pizza, and fantastic gluten free option as well!
Great authentic Italian pizzas. They have a wide selection and the pizzas are thin, crispy, and packed with natural flavors. Definitely recommend!
Best GLUTEN FREE pizza... EVER!
Excellent quality.
Some of the best pizza you might not have heard of. This place is legit pizza is worth every penny. Ive attempted to share a slice but have failed all 5 times I had it.

I DON'T USUALLY WRITE REVIEWS BUT THE FACT THAT I'M TYPING THIS RIGHT NOW....SAYS ALOT...PERIOD!.....TRY THE BEST FORGET THE REST!....I WENT AT 5PM...AND THEY DID NOT DISAPPOINT....HARLEM ON THE RISE!....
Best pizza in Harlem
This was one of the best pizzas I've ever eaten. The staff was friendly and willing to advise us which pizza to choose. If I ever visit NY again, this will be a sure stop.
Clean and very nice staff, the pizza is excellent and with very good products, the price is good; owners like me Italian are available and very nice; I will definitely come back !!!

Really delightful food, with high quality ingredients. Very, very good beers, with a lot of different options on the menu.The staff is super friendly, and the atmosphere is great. It's warm and cozy inside. Not too loud, good to go with friends or with a date.
I cant describe how incredible the experience was. Everything from the service to the food itself was 5 star worthy. This has topped my list on best pizza in NY without a doubt.
A family-friendly, delicious place to eat. I love to go on the weekends and get the burrata pizza.
Love the pizza from this joint and everything here taste pretty amazing. And I'm happy to say that everything here is reasonably priced too.
Ok it may be great if you actually speak Italian....
Up there with the best in the city - great food and atmosphere.
Pizza tastes authentic from crust down!
Lovely pizza nice service
Food is awesome, gluten free options very good. Have some trouble maintaining delivery service levels on Fridays.
Good guys!!!
Good pizza nice place to try
The best pizza in New York. Wood oven
Great pizza and great spot!
A pretty good place to enjoy a night out.
I'm a fan of thin crust & Sottocasa has it!Delicious & different combinations. You want to smother the crust in the hot oil & leave no crumb behind. Best Pizza in Harlem!
It's good if you like authentic thin crust pizza
I haven't even eaten yet but I feel like I am already full when I am at Sottocasa Pizzeria. They offer the best pizza there is and the place is nice and cozy.

We discovered sottocasa pizzeria in a pizza festival at little Italy of the Bronx and decided to go to Harlem to try their pizza. I tried the pizze bianche with radicchio, it was delicious; a great combination of flavors and the dough was crisp and soft.
Great pizza and service. Good prices too.
Phenomenal Gluten Free pizza. If you love chewy pizza, this is a must have
Looking for a good restaurant with incredible charm and killer food? Youll find it at Sottocasa. Incredible pizza and they treat everyone like family. What a cool little spot.
Very classy and the Lambrusco is the best I ever tasted.Great service and clean.
My favorite fancy pizzeria in NYC. Good gluten free options.
The ingredients are fresh , the sauce light with an amazing flavor , excellent service!!
The best Pizza Ive ever had in the US. The stuff was very friendly and corteous!

Yes!!   Want to experience luxurious Italian food, without the paparazzi, of whos who, like in NYC.   Then Sotto Casa is the place.  Fresh, quality food, in an environment that welcomes guests as if walking into their own home.    Did I
Absolutely loved it!

The fact that the staff speaks Italian and have the accent along with the decor makes me feel like I am in Italy. The food is authentic! Friendly, cozy and warm spot! Always greeted with a smile. PLEASE ORDER THE TIRAMISU!
Amazing pizza. Always a great experience! Highly recommend.
Great pizzas, wine choices, romantic ambiance, and fair prices. Coming to NYC we did a lot of research for the best pizza; this is the third and best spotgreat traditional Italian pizza.

I have Celiac disease. I rolled the dice and decided to eat the Gluten-Free pizza here despite the risk of cross contamination on the shared oven and mixer. They do their best to keep the cross contamination to a minimum and it worked for

The best gluten-free pizza I've ever eaten! In Italy I never found a dough like this, so much so that my husband said he didn't feel any difference between his (normal dough) and mine. Delightful staff.
Delicious pizza, genuine service, great location.
Really good italian pizza! Tasty, crispy and yummy! The owner is italian. The staff is friendly and helpful. The place is clean and cozy!
Beautiful atmosphere and food.
Great atmosphere! Loved our pizzas, spinocci salad and wine. Dessert (cannoli and tiramisu) was skippable.
Delicious!!
The gluten free pizza is next level delicious
We had true Italian pizza.. It was like at home! Recommend it at the 100 % if you want to try something authentic italian
Good taste pizza fast delivery definitely worth it
Quite good pizza and nice staff
Amazing! Everyone is polite and friendly. Pizza and desserts are great!
Excellent pizza experience. Great beer selection
Excellent pizzeria and good craft beer
Delicious...friendly owners.

The pizza is not bad, especially considering the fact of being in NY, but boys, the Neapolitan pizza is something else! This cannot be compared even as a joke! I think you can compare it to an honest pizza from an
In one night, I learned of the best authentic pizza spot uptown. Cheers.
This place has a warm spot in my heart they have become my favorite traditional Napolitana in NYC
Matteo the owner made us these yummy spritz.and the pizza was so good..

Ok I admit Im the worst kind of pizza geek. I imported a pizza oven from Italy that is in my backyard. That being said this place was great. We started with a Ceci (garbanzo bean) salad with tuna and capers and lemon that can only be
Great tasting pizza and enjoyed the craft brewing.
Excellent service~ The crust has a unique aroma
Loved the food, was a little busy when there but good atmosphere
This spot has my favourite gluten-unfastened pizza. Neopolitan fashion pizza with scrumptious toppings. Try them all.
Good pizza and service authentic Italian.
Delicious!
nice place
Great food and nice, relaxed atmosphere
Transporting. Every bit as good as any of the best in the city, including Roberta's and Motorino. Also very authentic, warm and hospitable! Can't wait to come back.
Excellent pizza and informal Italian environment
Spectacular pizzas in harlem For me the best thing is the Calzone. The place, despite being a little hidden, is very nice and inviting. They also make a great meal.

Whether you eat in or take out the service is spot on, very professional, polite and they get the order right every time. The crust is crunchy wood oven crispy and the top chewy delicious. Every pizza we have have been so flavorful, our
Amazing pizza, Neapolitan style.
So this is how real pizza taste like?? It just blowed my mind.Light is sauce, rich in flavor and wooden oven to perfection.
This place is soooo dope. Now I dont have to go to Brooklyn for an hour to get great Napoli pizza. This spot is off the chain!!!!!!
Best pizza in Harlem

Whether you eat in or take out the service is spot on, very professional, polite and they get the order right every time. The crust is crunchy wood oven crispy and the top chewy delicious. Every pizza we have have been so flavorful, our
Excellent
One of the best pizza place in Harlem. Order any pizza. There is no bad choice here.
Delicious food and cozy place, a must try pizza
Incredible
Amazing pizza! Very nice staff. Sandra and Saul were super great! The front is a little hard to see from the street but really yummy and worth stopping! Definitely recommend!
Wonderful place. The real Neapolitan pizza in New York !!!The staff is welcoming, attentive and helpful. I highly recommend one or more
This is a very nice but relaxed pizza place. The pizzas are fancy and tasty. They accommodate families with children well.

Location not easily identifiable, almost improbable, great welcome, clean and warm. We ate very well, the note may seem expensive for the French that we are: 113th + 20th tip for 5 basic pizzas, 2 desserts, 1 beer.
Bravo on the pizza. Top 3 restaurants and perhaps only 3 to eat at in Harlem.
Very good service. The pizza is amazing!
Great pizza
The service was great and the ambiance was perfect. The food was wonderful. Highly recommended!
